column5: Has anyone been fishing the blue zone this year? Its that time and I wanted to know if its firing out there yet. I usually run about 20 miles ESE of Oakville but with runs like that having a little pre info is appreciated.  Thanks  Darren
You must be in great shape.  I have always wanted to head out there. I here it,s like 20-30 fish days. Nothing super big,but lots of action.
Its worth the run, just do it!  S.

the cold(er) than average Lake Ontario temps have kept the bluezone from really setting up....  normally its a pretty warm surface then a good temp break 25' to 40' down - that's where the trout stack up (as well as the ho's).  this year the temp breaks are not as evident ... yet.  if your looking for bows, for some reason the west end of lake ontario, hamilton to bronte, has been on fire, with many double digit rainbow outings going on right now...  just run spoons in the top 40'

Thanks Steve  Been stuck inland not feeling good this year appreciate the tip, winds dont look good for a run oout there this weekend so \I guess I will stick close to shore. Bought a season pass in April havnt been out once. Grrrrrrrrrr
